name: A Pseudomonic Functor is Conservative
comments: Proof: Let F be pseudomonic and suppose F(f): F(X) -> F(Y) is an isomorphism. Since F is full on isomorphisms, there exists an isomorphism g: X -> Y in C with F(g) = F(f). Since F is faithful, f = g, so f is an isomorphism. Thus F reflects isomorphisms.
